alert.note: Alert for Mendocino Coast; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southwestern Humboldt (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 07 at 8:14AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN MENDOCINO AND SOUTH CENTRAL HUMBOLDT COUNTIES THROUGH 845 AM PST... At 814 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shelter Cove, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shelter Cove, Richardson Grove State Park, Whitehorn, Richardson Grove, Piercy, Briceland, and Benbow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mendocino Coast; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southwestern Humboldt
